__e: To tell the truth, since I heard you moved to Edo I've visited your house often, but you were never in
See, the morning after the murder, you told me it was your first visit to this house.
I've been here so many times, John. To the office too, but you were never in. I know.
You can not imagine, because you were not there on the day .
And now I'm not even supposed to ask you why you weren't there.
Well, you don't mind us, preacher, we don't mind you.
It is my personal belief that you are now, and were at the time of the training accident, physically unsuitable to be flying Category 1.
I needed you at the office. I found you absent.
I suppose you're going to tell me that you didn't know anything about that.
Oh, sure, of course you do, but I thought maybe there might be a few things you didn't agree with or might want him to change.
Well, you don't mind us, preacher, we don't mind you.
And would presumably have done the same with the other garments if you and your men had not arrived.
Yes, I am a silly girl... for not having seen sooner that you were nothing but a coward... with a heart full of fear.
When you were a boy at home... how many, many times did you ask us:
Till last night you were just a name on my list.
Georgie and me didn't want nobody thinkin' you still wasn't king.
I heard a lot of men running by, and then you were gone.
- Hélène told me you weren't in your room. I was sleeping.
